While in the darkness of the tunnels, Tucson could hear a faint voice recal=
ling Perceptor's words which were typed in on the computer.  He knew he had=
 to send a message back to Perceptor to let him know that he was still all =
right, and well on his way to finding Rodimus.  So he looks ahead, and wisp=
ers his reply which can also be heard in the lab.

" I will find him and I =
will bring him to saftey.  No Autobot abandons his comrades."

g@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wrote:

wife"

rms?

 what if I

ds don't seem

turns on his high beams to luminate the area, attempting to see if

ht was one of the insects weak spots.  He keeps it on as he walks

ard, hoping to find Rodimus.

here has to be some way to stop them. Everything has a weakness, it's

d, his voice was weak as he spoke,

rld." He paused as if trying to

eaking, "When they arrived
